author: daxian-dbw
body:
Since we rename `powershell` to `pwsh`, the variables `oldPowershellExeName` and the use of it should be removed from [`RemoveSxSPsHomeModulePath`](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/blob/master/src/System.Management.Automation/engine/Modules/ModuleIntrinsics.cs#L768) before RC/GA.

It's kept for now because for now people will try opening `pwsh` from existing powershell core.
title: Remove 'oldPowershellExeName' from 'RemoveSxSPsHomeModulePath' before RC/GA
